monthlySupport: Join our monthly donation program to provide ongoing support to our initiatives. Regular contributions, regardless of their amount, help us plan and support long-term projects.
awareness: Raising awareness of the charity's mission and cause.
helpOthers: Help us help our fellow citizens.
aboutFMED: We are a humanitarian organization created by Malians to help Malians.
supportInclusion: Help us assist our fellow citizens in need so they don’t feel left out.
maliSolidarity: Mali, a legendary country of solidarity, and FMED will uphold that tradition. We will work to maintain this balance among Malians.
realTimeNews: Follow our news in real time
